mapper.select: SELECT D.name AS "DeliveryName",D.address AS "DeliveryAddress", D.address_detail AS "DeliveryAddressDetail", D.zipcode AS "DeliveryZipCode", D.phone AS "DeliveryPhone", D.vendor AS "DeliveryVendor", D.tracking_number AS "DeliveryTrackingNumber", D.memo AS "DeliveryMemo" FROM delivery AS D WHERE D.delivery_id = #{deliveryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Delivery ( name , address, address_detail, zipcode, phone, memo, vendor, tracking_number ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zipCode}, #{phone}, #{memo}, #{vendor}, #{trackingNumber} );
